    • The Matrix Calculus

    2022-08-24 MachineLearning Calculus, Matrix, derivative 0 0 Comments Word Count: 8.8k(words) Read Count: 53(minutes)

    介绍 Introduction

    In this post, we hope to solve all derivative problems with matrix via the matrix differentiation + trace trick. We denote by lowercase letter xxx, bold lowercase letter x\mathbf{x}x, and bold uppercase letter X\mathbf{X}X a scalar, a vector, and a matrix, respectively. If we denote the entry of a vector and a matrix by xix_ixi​ and xi,jx_{i,j}xi,j​, and f(X)f(\mathbf{X})f(X) denotes the function of matrix X\mathbf{X}X, then we can intuitively define the dirivative of fff to X\mathbf{X}X as:

    ∇Xf=[∂f∂x1,1⋯∂f∂x1,n⋮⋱⋮∂f∂xm,1⋯∂f∂xm,n]\nabla_{\mathbf{X}}f = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{1,1}} & \cdots & \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{1,n}} \\ \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{m,1}} & \cdots & \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{m,n}} \end{bmatrix}∇X​f=⎣⎢⎢⎡​∂x1,1​∂f​⋮∂xm,1​∂f​​⋯⋱⋯​∂x1,n​∂f​⋮∂xm,n​∂f​​⎦⎥⎥⎤​

    Futhermore, we can build the connection between this derivation and matrix calculus as follows:

    df=∑i=1m∑j=1n∂f∂xi,j=tr[(∇Xf)⊤dX]\text{d}f=\sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{i,j}}=\text{tr}[(\nabla_{\mathbf{X}}f)^\top\text{d}\mathbf{X}]df=∑i=1m​∑j=1n​∂xi,j​∂f​=tr[(∇X​f)⊤dX].

    在这篇博客中，我们通过微分的思想来统一解决矩阵的一系列求导问题。我们用小写字母 xxx, 小写粗体字母 x\mathbf{x}x, 大写粗体字母 X\mathbf{X}X 分别表示标量，向量和矩阵。
    其中向量的元素表示为 xix_ixi​, 矩阵的元素表示为 xi,jx_{i,j}xi,j​。 如果 f(X)f(\mathbf{X})f(X) 表示关于矩阵X\mathbf{X}X的函数，则fff关于矩阵X\mathbf{X}X的导数可以直觉地定义为:

    ∇Xf=[∂f∂x1,1⋯∂f∂x1,n⋮⋱⋮∂f∂xm,1⋯∂f∂xm,n]\nabla_{\mathbf{X}}f = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{1,1}} & \cdots & \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{1,n}} \\ \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{m,1}} & \cdots & \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{m,n}} \end{bmatrix}∇X​f=⎣⎢⎢⎡​∂x1,1​∂f​⋮∂xm,1​∂f​​⋯⋱⋯​∂x1,n​∂f​⋮∂xm,n​∂f​​⎦⎥⎥⎤​

    从而，我们可以建立起矩阵与微分的关联：

    df=∑i=1m∑j=1n∂f∂xi,j=tr[(∇Xf)⊤dX]\text{d}f=\sum_{i=1}^m\sum_{j=1}^n\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{i,j}}=\text{tr}[(\nabla_{\mathbf{X}}f)^\top\text{d}\mathbf{X}]df=∑i=1m​∑j=1n​∂xi,j​∂f​=tr[(∇X​f)⊤dX].

    The operational criterion for matrix differentiation 矩阵微分运算法则

    d(X±Y)=dX±dY\text{d}(\mathbf{X}\pm\mathbf{Y})=\text{d}\mathbf{X}\pm\text{d}\mathbf{Y}d(X±Y)=dX±dY

    d（XY）=(dX)Y+XdY\text{d}（\mathbf{X}\mathbf{Y}）=(\text{d}\mathbf{X})\mathbf{Y}+\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{Y}d（XY）=(dX)Y+XdY

    d(X⊤)=(dX)⊤\text{d}(\mathbf{X}^\top) = (\text{d}\mathbf{X})^\topd(X⊤)=(dX)⊤

    d(tr(X))=tr(dX)\text{d}(\text{tr}(\mathbf{X})) = \text{tr}(\text{d}\mathbf{X})d(tr(X))=tr(dX)

    dX−1=−X−1(dX)X−1\text{d} \mathbf{X}^{-1} = -\mathbf{X}^{-1}(\text{d}\mathbf{X})\mathbf{X}^{-1}dX−1=−X−1(dX)X−1

    d∣X∣=∣X∣tr(X−1dX)d|\mathbf{X}| = |\mathbf{X}|tr(\mathbf{X}^{-1}d\mathbf{X})d∣X∣=∣X∣tr(X−1dX)

    d(X⊙Y)=dX⊙Y+X⊙dYd (\mathbf{X}\odot\mathbf{Y}) = d\mathbf{X}\odot\mathbf{Y} + \mathbf{X}\odot d\mathbf{Y}d(X⊙Y)=dX⊙Y+X⊙dY

    dσ(X)=σ′(X)⊙dXd \sigma(\mathbf{X}) = \sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{X})\odot d\mathbf{X}dσ(X)=σ′(X)⊙dX

    Trace Trick (Very Important!!!)

    a=tr(a)a=tr(a)a=tr(a)

    tr(A)=tr(A⊤)tr(\mathbf{A})=tr(\mathbf{A}^\top)tr(A)=tr(A⊤)

    tr(A±B)=tr(A)±tr(B)tr(\mathbf{A}\pm\mathbf{B}) = tr(\mathbf{A}) \pm tr(\mathbf{B})tr(A±B)=tr(A)±tr(B)

    tr(A⊤B)=∑i∑jai,jbi,jtr(\mathbf{A}^\top\mathbf{B}) = \sum_i\sum_j a_{i,j}b_{i,j}tr(A⊤B)=∑i​∑j​ai,j​bi,j​

    tr(A⊤B)=tr(BA⊤)=tr(B⊤A)=tr(AB⊤)tr(\mathbf{A}^\top\mathbf{B}) = tr(\mathbf{B}\mathbf{A}^\top) = tr(\mathbf{B}^\top\mathbf{A}) = tr(\mathbf{A}\mathbf{B}^\top)tr(A⊤B)=tr(BA⊤)=tr(B⊤A)=tr(AB⊤)

    tr[A⊤(B⊙C)]=tr[(A⊙B)⊤C]=∑i∑jai,jbi,jci,jtr[\mathbf{A}^\top(\mathbf{B}\odot\mathbf{C})] = tr[(\mathbf{A}\odot\mathbf{B})^\top\mathbf{C}] = \sum_i\sum_j a_{i,j}b_{i,j}c_{i,j}tr[A⊤(B⊙C)]=tr[(A⊙B)⊤C]=∑i​∑j​ai,j​bi,j​ci,j​

    Derivative of the Scalar to Matrix

    例1. 构造函数 No.1

    f=a⊤Xb,a∈Rm×1,X∈Rm×n,b∈Rn×1f = \mathbf{a}^\top \mathbf{X} \mathbf{b}, \mathbf{a}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times 1}, \mathbf{X}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}, \mathbf{b}\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times1}f=a⊤Xb,a∈Rm×1,X∈Rm×n,b∈Rn×1.

    Process:

    df=d(a⊤Xb)\text{d} f = \text{d}(\mathbf{a}^\top\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b})df=d(a⊤Xb)
    =tr[d(a⊤Xb)]= \text{tr}[\text{d}(\mathbf{a}^\top\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b})]=tr[d(a⊤Xb)]
    =tr[a⊤(dX)b]= \text{tr}[\mathbf{a}^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{X})\mathbf{b}]=tr[a⊤(dX)b]
    =tr(ba⊤dX)= \text{tr} (\mathbf{b}\mathbf{a}^\top\text{d}\mathbf{X})=tr(ba⊤dX)
    =tr[(ab⊤)⊤dX]= \text{tr} [(\mathbf{a}\mathbf{b}^\top)^\top\text{d}\mathbf{X}]=tr[(ab⊤)⊤dX]

    Answer:

    ∂f∂X=ab⊤\frac{\partial f}{\partial \mathbf{X}} = \mathbf{a}\mathbf{b}^\top∂X∂f​=ab⊤

    例 2. 构造函数 No.2

    f=a⊤eXb,a∈Rm×1,X∈Rm×n,b∈Rn×1f = \mathbf{a}^\top e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}}, \mathbf{a}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times1}, \mathbf{X}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}, \mathbf{b}\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times1}f=a⊤eXb,a∈Rm×1,X∈Rm×n,b∈Rn×1.

    Process:

    df=d(a⊤eXb)\text{d} f = \text{d}(\mathbf{a}^\top e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}})df=d(a⊤eXb)
    =tr[a⊤d(eXb)]= \text{tr}[\mathbf{a}^\top\text{d}(e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}})]=tr[a⊤d(eXb)]
    =tr{a⊤[eXb⊙d(Xb)]}= \text{tr} \{\mathbf{a}^\top [e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}}\odot\text{d}(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b})]\}=tr{a⊤[eXb⊙d(Xb)]}
    =tr[(a⊙eXb)⊤d(Xb)]= \text{tr} [{(\mathbf{a}\odot e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}})}^\top \text{d}(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b})]=tr[(a⊙eXb)⊤d(Xb)]
    =tr[(a⊙eXb)⊤(dX)b]= \text{tr} [{(\mathbf{a}\odot e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}})}^\top (\text{d}\mathbf{X})\mathbf{b}]=tr[(a⊙eXb)⊤(dX)b]
    =tr[b(a⊙eXb)⊤dX]= \text{tr} [\mathbf{b}{(\mathbf{a}\odot e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}})}^\top \text{d}\mathbf{X}]=tr[b(a⊙eXb)⊤dX]
    =tr{[(a⊙eXb)b⊤]⊤dX}= \text{tr} \{[(\mathbf{a}\odot e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}})\mathbf{b}^\top]^\top \text{d}\mathbf{X}\}=tr{[(a⊙eXb)b⊤]⊤dX}

    Answer:

    ∂f∂X=(a⊙eXb)b⊤\frac{\partial f}{\partial \mathbf{X}} = (\mathbf{a}\odot e^{\mathbf{X}\mathbf{b}})\mathbf{b}^\top∂X∂f​=(a⊙eXb)b⊤

    例 3. 构造函数 No.3

    f=tr(Y⊤MY),Y=σ(WX),W∈Rl×m,X∈Rm×n,M∈Rl×lf = tr(\mathbf{Y}^\top M\mathbf{Y}), Y = \sigma(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X}), \mathbf{W}\in\mathbb{R}^{l\times m}, \mathbf{X}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}, \mathbf{M}\in\mathbb{R}^{l\times l}f=tr(Y⊤MY),Y=σ(WX),W∈Rl×m,X∈Rm×n,M∈Rl×l.

    Process:

    df=tr[d(Y⊤MY)]\text{d} f = \text{tr} [\text{d} (\mathbf{Y}^\top\mathbf{M}\mathbf{Y})]df=tr[d(Y⊤MY)]
    =tr[d(Y⊤)MY+Y⊤MdY]= \text{tr} [\text{d} (\mathbf{Y}^\top) \mathbf{M}\mathbf{Y} + \mathbf{Y}^\top\mathbf{M}\text{d}\mathbf{Y}]=tr[d(Y⊤)MY+Y⊤MdY]
    =tr[(dY)⊤MY]+tr(Y⊤MdY)= \text{tr}[(\text{d}\mathbf{Y})^\top\mathbf{M}\mathbf{Y}] + \text{tr} (\mathbf{Y}^\top\mathbf{M}\text{d}\mathbf{Y})=tr[(dY)⊤MY]+tr(Y⊤MdY)
    =tr(Y⊤M⊤dY)+tr(Y⊤MdY)= \text{tr}(\mathbf{Y}^\top\mathbf{M}^\top\text{d}\mathbf{Y}) + \text{tr} (\mathbf{Y}^\top\mathbf{M}\text{d}\mathbf{Y})=tr(Y⊤M⊤dY)+tr(Y⊤MdY)
    =tr[Y⊤(M⊤+M)dY]= \text{tr} [\mathbf{Y}^\top(\mathbf{M}^\top + \mathbf{M})\text{d}\mathbf{Y}]=tr[Y⊤(M⊤+M)dY]
    =tr[Y⊤(M⊤+M)dσ(WX)]= \text{tr} [\mathbf{Y}^\top(\mathbf{M}^\top + \mathbf{M})\text{d}\sigma(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})]=tr[Y⊤(M⊤+M)dσ(WX)]
    =tr{Y⊤(M⊤+M)[σ′(WX)⊙d(WX)]}= \text{tr} \{\mathbf{Y}^\top(\mathbf{M}^\top + \mathbf{M})[\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X}) \odot \text{d}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})]\}=tr{Y⊤(M⊤+M)[σ′(WX)⊙d(WX)]}
    =tr{{[(M⊤+M)⊤Y]⊙σ′(WX)}⊤d(WX)}= \text{tr} \left\{\{[(\mathbf{M}^\top + \mathbf{M})^\top\mathbf{Y}]\odot\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})\}^\top\text{d}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})\right\}=tr{{[(M⊤+M)⊤Y]⊙σ′(WX)}⊤d(WX)}
    =tr{{[(M⊤+M)Y]⊙σ′(WX)}⊤WdX}= \text{tr} \left\{\{[(\mathbf{M}^\top + \mathbf{M})\mathbf{Y}]\odot\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})\}^\top\mathbf{W}\text{d}\mathbf{X}\right\}=tr{{[(M⊤+M)Y]⊙σ′(WX)}⊤WdX}
    =tr{{W⊤{[(M⊤+M)Y]⊙σ′(WX)}}⊤dX}= \text{tr} \left\{\left\{\mathbf{W}^\top\{[(\mathbf{M}^\top + \mathbf{M})\mathbf{Y}]\odot\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})\}\right\}^\top\text{d}\mathbf{X}\right\}=tr{{W⊤{[(M⊤+M)Y]⊙σ′(WX)}}⊤dX}

    Answer:

    ∂f∂X=W⊤{[(M+M⊤)σ(WX)]⊙σ′(WX)}\frac{\partial f}{\partial \mathbf{X}} = \mathbf{W}^\top\{[(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^\top)\sigma(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})] \odot \sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{X})\}∂X∂f​=W⊤{[(M+M⊤)σ(WX)]⊙σ′(WX)}

    例 4. Linear Regression

    ℓ=∥Xw−y∥22,X∈Rm×n,w∈Rn×1,y∈Rm×1\ell = \|\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y}\|_2^2, \mathbf{X}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}, \mathbf{w}\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times 1}, \mathbf{y}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times 1}ℓ=∥Xw−y∥22​,X∈Rm×n,w∈Rn×1,y∈Rm×1.

    Process:

    dl=d[(Xw−y)⊤(Xw−y)]\text{d} l = \text{d} [(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})]dl=d[(Xw−y)⊤(Xw−y)]
    =tr{[d(Xw−y)⊤](Xw−y)+(Xw−y)⊤d(Xw−y)}= \text{tr}\{[\text{d} (\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top] (\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y}) + (\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top \text{d}(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})\}=tr{[d(Xw−y)⊤](Xw−y)+(Xw−y)⊤d(Xw−y)}
    =tr{(Xdw)⊤(Xw−y)+(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)}= \text{tr}\{(\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{w})^\top(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y}) + (\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top(\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{w})\}=tr{(Xdw)⊤(Xw−y)+(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)}
    =tr[(Xdw)⊤(Xw−y)+(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)]= \text{tr}[(\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{w})^\top(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y}) + (\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top(\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{w})]=tr[(Xdw)⊤(Xw−y)+(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)]
    =tr[(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)+(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)]= \text{tr}[(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top(\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{w}) + (\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top(\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{w})]=tr[(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)+(Xw−y)⊤(Xdw)]
    =tr[2(Xw−y)⊤Xdw]= \text{tr}[2(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})^\top\mathbf{X}\text{d}\mathbf{w}]=tr[2(Xw−y)⊤Xdw]
    =tr{2[X⊤(Xw−y)]⊤dw}= \text{tr}\{2[\mathbf{X}^\top(\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - \mathbf{y})]^\top\text{d}\mathbf{w}\}=tr{2[X⊤(Xw−y)]⊤dw}

    Answer:

    ∂ℓ∂w=2X⊤Xw−2X⊤y→w=(X⊤X)−1X⊤y\frac{\partial \ell}{\partial \mathbf{w}} = 2\mathbf{X}^\top\mathbf{X}\mathbf{w} - 2\mathbf{X}^\top\mathbf{y} \rightarrow \mathbf{w} = (\mathbf{X}^\top\mathbf{X})^{-1}\mathbf{X}^\top\mathbf{y}∂w∂ℓ​=2X⊤Xw−2X⊤y→w=(X⊤X)−1X⊤y

    例 5. Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE) for the Multivariate Normal Distribution

    x1,⋯ ,xN∼N(μ,Σ),ℓ=MLE(Σ)=log⁡∣Σ∣+1N∑i=1N(xi−x‾)⊤Σ−1(xi−x‾),x‾=1N∑i=1Nxi,Σ∈Rm×m\mathbf{x}_1, \cdots, \mathbf{x}_N \sim \mathcal{N}(\mathbf{\mu}, \mathbf{\Sigma}), \ell = MLE(\mathbf{\Sigma}) = \log |\mathbf{\Sigma}| + \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N{(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})}^\top\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}}), \overline{\mathbf{x}} = \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\mathbf{x}_i, \mathbf{\Sigma}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times m}x1​,⋯,xN​∼N(μ,Σ),ℓ=MLE(Σ)=log∣Σ∣+N1​∑i=1N​(xi​−x)⊤Σ−1(xi​−x),x=N1​∑i=1N​xi​,Σ∈Rm×m.

    Process:

    dℓ=tr[d(log⁡∣Σ∣)+1N∑i=1N(xi−x‾)⊤(dΣ−1)(xi−x‾)]\text{d} \ell = \text{tr} [\text{d} (\log|\mathbf{\Sigma}|) + \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1})(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})]dℓ=tr[d(log∣Σ∣)+N1​∑i=1N​(xi​−x)⊤(dΣ−1)(xi​−x)]
    =tr(1∣Σ∣⊙d∣Σ∣)+1N∑i=1Ntr[(xi−x‾)⊤(dΣ−1)(xi−x‾)]= \text{tr} (\frac{1}{|\mathbf{\Sigma}|}\odot\text{d}|\mathbf{\Sigma}|) + \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\text{tr}[(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1})(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})]=tr(∣Σ∣1​⊙d∣Σ∣)+N1​∑i=1N​tr[(xi​−x)⊤(dΣ−1)(xi​−x)]
    =tr{1∣Σ∣⋅∣Σ∣tr(Σ−1dΣ)}+1N∑i=1Ntr[(xi−x‾)(xi−x‾)⊤(dΣ−1)]= \text{tr} \{\frac{1}{|\mathbf{\Sigma}|}\cdot|\mathbf{\Sigma}|\text{tr}(\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma})\} + \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\text{tr}[(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1})]=tr{∣Σ∣1​⋅∣Σ∣tr(Σ−1dΣ)}+N1​∑i=1N​tr[(xi​−x)(xi​−x)⊤(dΣ−1)]
    =tr(Σ−1dΣ)−1N∑i=1Ntr{(xi−x‾)(xi−x‾)⊤[Σ−1(dΣ)Σ−1]}= \text{tr}(\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma}) - \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\text{tr}\{(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})^\top[\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}(\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma})\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}]\}=tr(Σ−1dΣ)−N1​∑i=1N​tr{(xi​−x)(xi​−x)⊤[Σ−1(dΣ)Σ−1]}
    =tr(Σ−1dΣ)−1N∑i=1Ntr[Σ−1(xi−x‾)(xi−x‾)⊤Σ−1dΣ]= \text{tr}(\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma}) - \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\text{tr}[\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})^\top\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma}]=tr(Σ−1dΣ)−N1​∑i=1N​tr[Σ−1(xi​−x)(xi​−x)⊤Σ−1dΣ]
    =tr{[Σ−1−1N∑i=1NΣ−1(xi−x‾)(xi−x‾)⊤Σ−1]dΣ}= \text{tr}\left\{[\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1} - \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})^\top\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}]\text{d}\mathbf{\Sigma}\right\}=tr{[Σ−1−N1​∑i=1N​Σ−1(xi​−x)(xi​−x)⊤Σ−1]dΣ}

    Answer:

    ∂ℓ∂Σ={Σ−1−1N∑i=1NΣ−1[(xi−x‾)(xi−x‾)⊤]Σ−1}⊤\frac{\partial \ell}{\partial \mathbf{\Sigma}} = {\{\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1} - \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}[(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}}){(\mathbf{x}_i - \overline{\mathbf{x}})}^\top]\mathbf{\Sigma}^{-1}\}}^\top∂Σ∂ℓ​={Σ−1−N1​∑i=1N​Σ−1[(xi​−x)(xi​−x)⊤]Σ−1}⊤

    例 6. Multinomial Logistic Regression.

    ℓ=−y⊤log⁡softmax(Wx),y is a one-hot encoding vector with size m,W∈Rm×n,x∈Rn×1,y∈Rm×1,softmax(a)=ea1⊤ea\ell = -\mathbf{y}^\top \log softmax(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}), \mathbf{y} \text{ is a one-hot encoding vector with size } m, \mathbf{W}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}, \mathbf{x}\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times 1}, \mathbf{y}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times 1}, softmax(\mathbf{a}) = \frac{e^{\mathbf{a}}}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{a}}}ℓ=−y⊤logsoftmax(Wx),y is a one-hot encoding vector with size m,W∈Rm×n,x∈Rn×1,y∈Rm×1,softmax(a)=1⊤eaea​.

    Process:

    ℓ=−y⊤log⁡softmax(Wx)\ell = -\mathbf{y}^\top\log \text{softmax}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x})ℓ=−y⊤logsoftmax(Wx)
    =−y⊤log⁡eWx1⊤eWx= -\mathbf{y}^\top\log \frac{\text{e}^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}{\mathbf{1}^\top\text{e}^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}=−y⊤log1⊤eWxeWx​
    =−y⊤(Wx)+y⊤log⁡[1⋅(1⊤eWx)]= -\mathbf{y}^\top (\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}) + \mathbf{y}^\top\log [\mathbf{1}\cdot(\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}})]=−y⊤(Wx)+y⊤log[1⋅(1⊤eWx)]
    =−y⊤(Wx)+(y⊤1)log⁡(1⊤eWx)= -\mathbf{y}^\top (\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}) + (\mathbf{y}^\top\mathbf{1})\log (\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}})=−y⊤(Wx)+(y⊤1)log(1⊤eWx)
    =−y⊤(Wx)+log⁡(1⊤eWx)= -\mathbf{y}^\top (\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}) + \log (\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}})=−y⊤(Wx)+log(1⊤eWx)
    dℓ=tr[−y⊤(dW)x+11⊤eWxd(1⊤eWx)]\text{d} \ell = \text{tr} [-\mathbf{y}^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{W})\mathbf{x} + \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}\text{d}(\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}})]dℓ=tr[−y⊤(dW)x+1⊤eWx1​d(1⊤eWx)]
    =tr[−y⊤(dW)x+11⊤eWx⋅1⊤deWx]= \text{tr} [-\mathbf{y}^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{W})\mathbf{x} + \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}\cdot\mathbf{1}^\top\text{d}e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}]=tr[−y⊤(dW)x+1⊤eWx1​⋅1⊤deWx]
    =tr{−y⊤(dW)x+11⊤eWx⋅1⊤[eWx⊙d(Wx)]}= \text{tr} \{-\mathbf{y}^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{W})\mathbf{x} + \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}\cdot \mathbf{1}^\top [e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}\odot\text{d}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x})]\}=tr{−y⊤(dW)x+1⊤eWx1​⋅1⊤[eWx⊙d(Wx)]}
    =tr[−y⊤(dW)x]+11⊤eWxtr{1⊤[eWx⊙d(Wx)]}= \text{tr} [-\mathbf{y}^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{W})\mathbf{x}] + \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}\text{tr} \{\mathbf{1}^\top [e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}\odot\text{d}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x})]\}=tr[−y⊤(dW)x]+1⊤eWx1​tr{1⊤[eWx⊙d(Wx)]}
    =tr[−y⊤(dW)x]+11⊤eWxtr[(1⊙eWx)⊤d(Wx)]= \text{tr} [-\mathbf{y}^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{W})\mathbf{x}] + \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}\text{tr} [(\mathbf{1}\odot e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}})^\top\text{d}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x})]=tr[−y⊤(dW)x]+1⊤eWx1​tr[(1⊙eWx)⊤d(Wx)]
    =tr(−xy⊤dW)+11⊤eWxtr[(1⊙eWx)⊤(dW)x]= \text{tr} (-\mathbf{x}\mathbf{y}^\top\text{d}\mathbf{W}) + \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}\text{tr} [(\mathbf{1}\odot e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}})^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{W})\mathbf{x}]=tr(−xy⊤dW)+1⊤eWx1​tr[(1⊙eWx)⊤(dW)x]
    =tr{[−xy⊤+x(eWx)⊤1⊤eWx]dW}= \text{tr} \{[-\mathbf{x}\mathbf{y}^\top + \mathbf{x}\frac{(e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}})^\top}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}]\text{d}\mathbf{W}\}=tr{[−xy⊤+x1⊤eWx(eWx)⊤​]dW}
    =tr{[(eWx1⊤eWx−y)x⊤]⊤dW}= \text{tr} \left\{[(\frac{e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}}} - \mathbf{y})\mathbf{x}^\top]^\top\text{d}\mathbf{W}\right\}=tr{[(1⊤eWxeWx​−y)x⊤]⊤dW}
    Answer:

    ∂ℓ∂W=[softmax(Wx)−y]x⊤\frac{\partial \ell}{\partial \mathbf{W}} = [softmax(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}) - \mathbf{y}]\mathbf{x}^\top∂W∂ℓ​=[softmax(Wx)−y]x⊤

    例 7. Back Propagation (BP) for Multi-Layer Perceptron (MLP)

    ℓ=−∑i=1Nyi⊤log⁡softmax[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2],xi∈Rn×1,yi is a one-hot encoding vector with size m,\ell = - \sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{y}_i^\top\log softmax[\mathbf{W}_2 \sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2], \mathbf{x}_i \in \mathbb{R}^{n\times 1}, \mathbf{y}_i \text{ is a one-hot encoding vector with size } m,ℓ=−∑i=1N​yi⊤​logsoftmax[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​],xi​∈Rn×1,yi​ is a one-hot encoding vector with size m,

    W1∈Rp×n,b1∈Rp×1,W2∈Rm×p,b2∈Rm×1\mathbf{W}_1 \in \mathbb{R}^{p\times n}, \mathbf{b}_1 \in \mathbb{R}^{p\times 1}, \mathbf{W}_2 \in \mathbb{R}^{m\times p}, \mathbf{b}_2 \in \mathbb{R}^{m\times 1}W1​∈Rp×n,b1​∈Rp×1,W2​∈Rm×p,b2​∈Rm×1.

    Process:

    ℓ=−∑i=1Nyi⊤log⁡softmax[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]\ell = -\sum_{i=1}^N\mathbf{y}_i^{\top}\log\text{softmax}[\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2]ℓ=−∑i=1N​yi⊤​logsoftmax[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]
    =−∑i=1Nyi⊤log⁡eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b21⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2= -\sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{y}_i^\top \log\frac{e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}=−∑i=1N​yi⊤​log1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​​
    =−∑i=1Nyi⊤[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2−log⁡(1⋅1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2)]= -\sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{y}_i^\top[\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2 - \log(\mathbf{1}\cdot\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2})]=−∑i=1N​yi⊤​[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​−log(1⋅1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​)]
    =−∑i=1N{yi⊤[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−(yi⊤1)log⁡(1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2)}= -\sum_{i=1}^N\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top[\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - (\mathbf{y}_i^\top\mathbf{1})\log(\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2})\right\}=−∑i=1N​{yi⊤​[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−(yi⊤​1)log(1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​)}
    =−∑i=1N{yi⊤[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−log⁡(1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2)}= -\sum_{i=1}^N\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top[\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \log(\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2})\right\}=−∑i=1N​{yi⊤​[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−log(1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​)}

    dℓ=−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤d[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−11⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2d[1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}\text{d} \ell = -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\text{d} [\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} \text{d} [\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]\right\}dℓ=−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​d[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1​d[1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}
    =====w.r.t. W2−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤(dW2)σ(W1xi+b1)−11⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2[1⊤deW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{W}_2}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top(\text{d}\mathbf{W}_2)\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) - \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} [\mathbf{1}^\top \text{d} e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]\right\}=====w.r.t. W2​−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​(dW2​)σ(W1​xi​+b1​)−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1​[1⊤deW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}

    =====w.r.t. b2−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤db2−11⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2[1⊤deW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_2}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\text{d}\mathbf{b}_2 - \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} [\mathbf{1}^\top \text{d} e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]\right\}=====w.r.t. b2​−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​db2​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1​[1⊤deW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}
    =====w.r.t. b2−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤db2−1⊤{eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2⊙d[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_2}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\text{d}\mathbf{b}_2 - \frac{\mathbf{1}^\top \{e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2} \odot \text{d} [\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2]\}}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}\right\}=====w.r.t. b2​−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​db2​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1⊤{eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​⊙d[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}​}
    =====w.r.t. b2−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤db2−[eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]⊤d[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_2}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\text{d}\mathbf{b}_2 - \frac{[e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]^\top \text{d} [\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2]}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}\right\}=====w.r.t. b2​−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​db2​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​[eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]⊤d[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]​}
    =====w.r.t. b2−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤db2−[eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]⊤db21⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_2}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\text{d}\mathbf{b}_2 - \frac{[e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]^\top \text{d} \mathbf{b}_2}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}\right\}=====w.r.t. b2​−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​db2​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​[eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]⊤db2​​}
    =====w.r.t. b2∑i=1Ntr{(eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b21⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2−yi)⊤db2}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_2}{=====} \sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{ (\frac{e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} - \mathbf{y}_i)^\top\text{d}\mathbf{b}_2 \right\}=====w.r.t. b2​∑i=1N​tr{(1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​​−yi​)⊤db2​}
    =====w.r.t. b2∑i=1Ntr{(softmax(W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2)−yi)⊤db2}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_2}{=====} \sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{ (\text{softmax}(\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2) - \mathbf{y}_i)^\top\text{d}\mathbf{b}_2 \right\}=====w.r.t. b2​∑i=1N​tr{(softmax(W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​)−yi​)⊤db2​}

    dℓ=−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤d[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−11⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2d[1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}\text{d} \ell = -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\text{d} [\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} \text{d} [\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]\right\}dℓ=−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​d[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1​d[1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}
    =====w.r.t. W1−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤W2dσ(W1xi+b1)−11⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2[1⊤deW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{W}_1}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\mathbf{W}_2\text{d}\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) - \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} [\mathbf{1}^\top \text{d} e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]\right\}=====w.r.t. W1​−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​W2​dσ(W1​xi​+b1​)−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1​[1⊤deW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}
    =====w.r.t. W1−∑i=1Ntr{{yi⊤−[eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]⊤1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2}W2[σ′(W1xi+b1)⊙d(W1xi)]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{W}_1}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top - \frac{[e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]^\top}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}\}\mathbf{W}_2[\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) \odot\text{d}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i)]\right\}=====w.r.t. W1​−∑i=1N​tr{{yi⊤​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​[eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]⊤​}W2​[σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)⊙d(W1​xi​)]}
    =====w.r.t. W1−∑i=1Ntr{{W2⊤[yi−eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b21⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}⊤[σ′(W1xi+b1)⊙d(W1xi)]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{W}_1}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\{ {\mathbf{W}_2}^\top[\mathbf{y}_i - \frac{e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}]\}^\top[\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) \odot\text{d}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i)]\right\}=====w.r.t. W1​−∑i=1N​tr{{W2​⊤[yi​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​​]}⊤[σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)⊙d(W1​xi​)]}
    =====w.r.t. W1−∑i=1Ntr{{{W2⊤[yi−softmax(W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2)]}⊙σ′(W1xi+b1)}⊤d(W1xi)}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{W}_1}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\left\{\{ {\mathbf{W}_2}^\top[\mathbf{y}_i - \text{softmax}(\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2)]\}\odot\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1)\right\}^\top\text{d}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i)\right\}=====w.r.t. W1​−∑i=1N​tr{{{W2​⊤[yi​−softmax(W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​)]}⊙σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)}⊤d(W1​xi​)}
    =====w.r.t. W1∑i=1Ntr{{{W2⊤[softmax(W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2)−yi]}⊙σ′(W1xi+b1)⋅xi⊤}⊤dW1}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{W}_1}{=====} \sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\left\{\{ {\mathbf{W}_2}^\top[\text{softmax}(\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2) - \mathbf{y}_i]\}\odot\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1)\cdot\mathbf{x}_i^\top\right\}^\top\text{d}\mathbf{W}_1\right\}=====w.r.t. W1​∑i=1N​tr{{{W2​⊤[softmax(W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​)−yi​]}⊙σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)⋅xi⊤​}⊤dW1​}

    dℓ=−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤d[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−11⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2d[1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}\text{d} \ell = -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\text{d} [\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} \text{d} [\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]\right\}dℓ=−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​d[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1​d[1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}
    =====w.r.t. b1−∑i=1Ntr{yi⊤W2dσ(W1xi+b1)−11⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2[1⊤deW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_1}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top\mathbf{W}_2\text{d}\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) - \frac{1}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}} [\mathbf{1}^\top \text{d} e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]\right\}=====w.r.t. b1​−∑i=1N​tr{yi⊤​W2​dσ(W1​xi​+b1​)−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​1​[1⊤deW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]}
    =====w.r.t. b1−∑i=1Ntr{{yi⊤−[eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]⊤1⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2}W2[σ′(W1xi+b1)⊙db1]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_1}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\{\mathbf{y}_i^\top - \frac{[e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}]^\top}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}\}\mathbf{W}_2[\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) \odot\text{d}\mathbf{b}_1]\right\}=====w.r.t. b1​−∑i=1N​tr{{yi⊤​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​[eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]⊤​}W2​[σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)⊙db1​]}
    =====w.r.t. b1−∑i=1Ntr{{W2⊤[yi−eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b21⊤eW2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]}⊤[σ′(W1xi+b1)⊙db1]}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_1}{=====} -\sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\{ {\mathbf{W}_2}^\top[\mathbf{y}_i - \frac{e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}{\mathbf{1}^\top e^{\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2}}]\}^\top[\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) \odot\text{d}\mathbf{b}_1]\right\}=====w.r.t. b1​−∑i=1N​tr{{W2​⊤[yi​−1⊤eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​eW2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​​]}⊤[σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)⊙db1​]}
    =====w.r.t. b1∑i=1Ntr{{{W2⊤[softmax(W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2)−yi]}⊙σ′(W1xi+b1)}⊤db1}\overset{\text{w.r.t.}~\mathbf{b}_1}{=====} \sum_{i=1}^N \text{tr}\left\{\left\{\{ {\mathbf{W}_2}^\top[\text{softmax}(\mathbf{W}_2\sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2) - \mathbf{y}_i]\}\odot\sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1)\right\}^\top\text{d}\mathbf{b}_1\right\}=====w.r.t. b1​∑i=1N​tr{{{W2​⊤[softmax(W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​)−yi​]}⊙σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)}⊤db1​}

    Answer:

    ∂ℓ∂W2=∑i=1N{softmax[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−yi}σ⊤(W1xi+b1)\frac{\partial \ell}{\partial \mathbf{W}_2} = \sum_{i=1}^N \{softmax[\mathbf{W}_2 \sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \mathbf{y}_i\} \sigma^\top(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1)∂W2​∂ℓ​=∑i=1N​{softmax[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−yi​}σ⊤(W1​xi​+b1​)

    ∂ℓ∂b2=∑i=1Nsoftmax[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−yi\frac{\partial \ell}{\partial \mathbf{b}_2} = \sum_{i=1}^N softmax[\mathbf{W}_2 \sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \mathbf{y}_i∂b2​∂ℓ​=∑i=1N​softmax[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−yi​

    ∂ℓ∂W1=∑i=1N{{W2⊤{softmax[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−yi}}⊙σ′(W1xi+b1)}xi⊤\frac{\partial \ell}{\partial \mathbf{W}_1} = \sum_{i=1}^N \{\{\mathbf{W}_2^\top\{softmax[\mathbf{W}_2 \sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \mathbf{y}_i\}\} \odot \sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) \} \mathbf{x}_i^\top∂W1​∂ℓ​=∑i=1N​{{W2⊤​{softmax[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−yi​}}⊙σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)}xi⊤​

    ∂ℓ∂b1=∑i=1N{W2⊤{softmax[W2σ(W1xi+b1)+b2]−yi}}⊙σ′(W1xi+b1)\frac{\partial \ell}{\partial \mathbf{b}_1} = \sum_{i=1}^N \{\mathbf{W}_2^\top\{softmax[\mathbf{W}_2 \sigma(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1) + \mathbf{b}_2] - \mathbf{y}_i\}\} \odot \sigma^{\prime}(\mathbf{W}_1\mathbf{x}_i + \mathbf{b}_1)∂b1​∂ℓ​=∑i=1N​{W2⊤​{softmax[W2​σ(W1​xi​+b1​)+b2​]−yi​}}⊙σ′(W1​xi​+b1​)

    Derivative of the Matrix to Matrix

    假设f(x)∈Rp×1\mathbf{f}(\mathbf{x})\in\mathbb{R}^{p\times 1}f(x)∈Rp×1是关于向量x∈Rn×1\mathbf{x}\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times 1}x∈Rn×1的函数。不失优雅地（不考虑矩阵布局），我们由向量微分与偏导的关联（df=∂f∂x⊤dxd\mathbf{f}=\frac{\partial\mathbf{f}}{\partial\mathbf{x}}^\top d\mathbf{x}df=∂x∂f​⊤dx），反推给出列向量对列向量的偏导定义如下：

    ∂f∂x=[∂f1∂x1⋯∂fp∂x1⋮⋱⋮∂f1∂xn⋯∂fp∂xn]∈Rn×p\frac{\partial \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{x}} = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial f_1}{\partial x_{1}} & \cdots & \frac{\partial f_p}{\partial x_1} \\ \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ \frac{\partial f_1}{\partial x_{n}} & \cdots & \frac{\partial f_p}{\partial x_n} \end{bmatrix} \in \mathbb{R}^{n\times p}∂x∂f​=⎣⎢⎢⎡​∂x1​∂f1​​⋮∂xn​∂f1​​​⋯⋱⋯​∂x1​∂fp​​⋮∂xn​∂fp​​​⎦⎥⎥⎤​∈Rn×p

    在给出矩阵对矩阵的导数定义前，我们先定义矩阵X∈Rm×n\mathbf{X}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}X∈Rm×n的向量化为Vec(X)=[x1,1,x2,1,⋯ ,xm,1,x1,2,⋯ ,xm,n]⊤\text{Vec}(\mathbf{X})=[x_{1,1},x_{2,1},\cdots,x_{m,1},x_{1,2},\cdots,x_{m,n}]^\topVec(X)=[x1,1​,x2,1​,⋯,xm,1​,x1,2​,⋯,xm,n​]⊤。从而进一步地我们定义矩阵F∈Rp×q\mathbf{F}\in\mathbb{R}^{p\times q}F∈Rp×q对矩阵X∈Rm×n\mathbf{X}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}X∈Rm×n的导数如下：

    ∂F∂X=∂Vec(F)∂Vec(X)∈Rmn×pq\frac{\partial \mathbf{F}}{\partial \mathbf{X}} = \frac{\partial \text{Vec}(\mathbf{F})}{\partial \text{Vec}(\mathbf{X})}\in\mathbb{R}^{mn\times pq}∂X∂F​=∂Vec(X)∂Vec(F)​∈Rmn×pq

    同时，导数与微分的联系可以不失一般地表示为：

    Vec(dF)=(∂Vec(F)∂Vec(X))⊤Vec(dX)=(∂F∂X)⊤Vec(dX)\text{Vec}(d\mathbf{F}) = (\frac{\partial \text{Vec}(\mathbf{F})}{\partial \text{Vec}(\mathbf{X})})^\top\text{Vec}(d\mathbf{X}) = (\frac{\partial \mathbf{F}}{\partial \mathbf{X}})^\top\text{Vec}(d\mathbf{X})Vec(dF)=(∂Vec(X)∂Vec(F)​)⊤Vec(dX)=(∂X∂F​)⊤Vec(dX).

    若FFF降级为标量fff时，我们有∂f∂X=Vec(∇Xf)\frac{\partial f}{\partial \mathbf{X}} = \text{Vec}(\nabla_{\mathbf{X}}f)∂X∂f​=Vec(∇X​f)。在此基础上求二阶导，得到机器学习中常见的 Hessian matrix:

    ∇X2f=∂2f∂X2=∂(∇Xf)∂X∈Rmn×mn\nabla^2_{\mathbf{X}}f = \frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial\mathbf{X}^2} = \frac{\partial (\nabla_{\mathbf{X}}f)}{\partial \mathbf{X}}\in\mathbb{R}^{mn\times mn}∇X2​f=∂X2∂2f​=∂X∂(∇X​f)​∈Rmn×mn.

    Notice: 若从分子布局和分母布局的角度出发，与微分相关联且不失一般性的布局为分母布局，机器学习和优化理论常用此布局。

    Vectorization Trick

    Vec(A+B)=Vec(A)+Vec(B)\text{Vec}(\mathbf{A} + \mathbf{B}) = \text{Vec}(A) + \text{Vec}(B)Vec(A+B)=Vec(A)+Vec(B)

    Vec(AXB)=(B⊤⊗A)Vec(X)\text{Vec}(\mathbf{A}\mathbf{X}\mathbf{B}) = (\mathbf{B}^\top\otimes \mathbf{A})\text{Vec}(\mathbf{X})Vec(AXB)=(B⊤⊗A)Vec(X)，其中⊗\otimes⊗表示 Kronecker Product：A⊗B(A∈Rm×n,B∈Rp×q)=[a1,1B⋯a1,nB⋮⋱⋮am,1B⋯am,nB]\mathbf{A}\otimes\mathbf{B}(\mathbf{A}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}, \mathbf{B}\in\mathbb{R}^{p\times q}) = \begin{bmatrix} a_{1,1}\mathbf{B} & \cdots & a_{1,n}\mathbf{B}\\ \vdots & \ddots & \vdots\\ a_{m,1}\mathbf{B} & \cdots & a_{m,n}\mathbf{B} \end{bmatrix}A⊗B(A∈Rm×n,B∈Rp×q)=⎣⎢⎡​a1,1​B⋮am,1​B​⋯⋱⋯​a1,n​B⋮am,n​B​⎦⎥⎤​

    Vec(AT)=KmnVec(A)\text{Vec}(\mathbf{A}^T)=\mathbf{K}_{mn}\text{Vec}(\mathbf{A})Vec(AT)=Kmn​Vec(A), 其中 Kmn\mathbf{K}_{mn}Kmn​ 为交换矩阵（∑iki,j=∑jki,j=1\sum_i k_{i,j} = \sum_j k_{i,j} = 1∑i​ki,j​=∑j​ki,j​=1）

    Vec(A⊙B)=Diag(A)VecB\text{Vec}(\mathbf{A}\odot\mathbf{B}) = \text{Diag}(\mathbf{A})\text{Vec}{\mathbf{B}}Vec(A⊙B)=Diag(A)VecB，其中Diag(A)\text{Diag}(\mathbf{A})Diag(A)为对角化操作，即把Vec(A)\text{Vec}(\mathbf{A})Vec(A)中所有元素排成对角阵（除对角线外其余元素全为零）

    (A⊗B)⊤=A⊤⊗B⊤(\mathbf{A}\otimes\mathbf{B})^\top = \mathbf{A}^\top\otimes\mathbf{B}^\top(A⊗B)⊤=A⊤⊗B⊤

    b⊗a=Vec(ab⊤)\mathbf{b}\otimes\mathbf{a} = \text{Vec}(\mathbf{a}\mathbf{b}^\top)b⊗a=Vec(ab⊤)

    例 8. 构造函数

    F=AX,X∈Rm×n\mathbf{F} = \mathbf{A}\mathbf{X}, \mathbf{X}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}F=AX,X∈Rm×n

    l=−yx⊤w+log(1+exp(x⊤w))l = -y\mathbf{x}^\top\mathbf{w} + \text{log}(1 + \text{exp}(\mathbf{x}^\top\mathbf{w}))l=−yx⊤w+log(1+exp(x⊤w))，求∇wl\nabla_{\mathbf{w}}l∇w​l和∇w2l\nabla^2_{\mathbf{w}}l∇w2​l，其中y∈0,1,x,w∈Rn×1y\in{0,1}, \mathbf{x},\mathbf{w}\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times 1}y∈0,1,x,w∈Rn×1.

    例 12. 多元 logistic 回归

    l=−y⊤logsoftmax(Wx)=−y⊤Wx+log(1⊤exp(Wx))l = -\mathbf{y}^\top\text{logsoftmax}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}) = -\mathbf{y}^\top\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x} + \text{log}(\mathbf{1}^\top\text{exp}(\mathbf{W}\mathbf{x}))l=−y⊤logsoftmax(Wx)=−y⊤Wx+log(1⊤exp(Wx))，求∇wl\nabla_{\mathbf{w}}l∇w​l和∇w2l\nabla^2_{\mathbf{w}}l∇w2​l，其中y∈Rm且为one−hot编码,x∈Rn,W∈Rm×ny\in\mathbb{R}^{m}且为 one-hot 编码, \mathbf{x}\in\mathbb{R}^{n}, \mathbf{W}\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}y∈Rm且为one−hot编码,x∈Rn,W∈Rm×n.
